Name: Farming
Notes: Includes crops; animal rearing and slaughter; milk and wool production; seed processing; hunting and trapping. Excludes food processing - see lse-mfg
NACE name: Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities

Name: Forestry
Notes: Includes logging and non-wood forestry products

Name: Fishing
Notes: Includes fish farming and other aquaculture

Name: Tobacco products
Notes: Includes cigarettes but not vaping products (classified as chemicals)

Name: Leather products
NACE name: Manufacture of leather and related products of other materials

Name: Wood products
NACE name: Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture; manufacture of articles of straw and plaiting materials

Name: Paper products
NACE name: Manufacture of paper and paper products

Name: Recorded media
NACE name: Printing and reproduction of recorded media

Name: Rubber and plastic products
NACE name: Manufacture of rubber and plastic products

Name: Non-metallic mineral products
NACE name: Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products

Name: Metal products
NACE name: Manufacture of basic metals; manufacture of fabricated metal products, except machinery and equipment

Name: Repair
NACE name: Repair, maintenance and installation of machinery and equipment

Name: OTC markets
Notes: Markets for 'over-the-counter' bilateral trading in securities not listed on a recognised exchange

Name: Vehicle rental
Notes: Includes short term (e.g. car hire) and longer term (e.g. car financing) transactions, but not taxis and similar (which are transport services - see ISIC 492)
